Third door on the left.
Right!

: Hey.

It’s a little old but…

No.

I didn’t… I never said that.

(starting to cry) Okay, I’m sorry. (Runs out still carrying the

God! If you’re gonna cry about it! (She grabs the box and goes to
through it out.]
Whoa-whoa, Treeger made you cry?
Yes! And he said really mean things that were only partly true.
I’m gonna go down there and teach that guy a lesson.

Joey, please don’t do that. I think it’s best that we just

That’s easy for you to say, you weren’t almost just killed.

All right that’s it, school is in session! (Exits and slams the

(Picking up a card from Chandler’s wallet.) My God! Is this a gym

Oh yeah, gym member. I try to go four times a week, but I’ve

So why don’t you quit?
You don’t think I’ve tried? You think I
Who is Maria?

Oh Maria. You can’t say no to her, she’s like this lycra

You need me to go down there with you and hold your hand?
No!
So you’re strong enough to face her on your own?
Oh no, you’ll have to come.
: Tribbiani! Hold on, I’ll get the plunger.

Hey! You hold on pal! Now you made my friend, Rachel, cry. So now,

: And tell him what?
Have you heard about a little something called, Not Making Girls Cry.

: Yeah. Well maybe you have heard about the Rent Stabilization Act

I have actually

: Yeah, well your friends are in violation of it. I’ve been a

Why don’t you tell me something I don’t know! (He storms out,
and once Treeger closes the door behind him, Joey makes an ‘Oops!’ have.)
Oh please, somebody tell me I don’t have to go to work today!
What’s the matter?

Oh, my first massage today is this incredibly gorgeous guy, and every

So do them for free.

Oh no, it is forbidden! No-no, Mrs. Potter fires people for fooling

They make you take an oath?

No, I made myself take an oath. Yeah, no fooling around with clients and

Why don’t you just give him to somebody else?
No, I can handle it. No, I’m a professional. (She starts to leave)
Oh Pheebs, is that a new ankle bracelet?
Wow! And you got a petticure. Your feet are all dressed up.

Because that’s the only part of you he can see when he’s on

You’re gonna do some feet flirtin’!

I don’t what your talking about. (Laughs nervously and continues to

Because it’s Arabian princess day at work! Okay?! Leave me alone!
Oh! My hero! What happened?

Well uh, I went down there and told him that no one treats my friends like

(Starts to leave)
What a minute, what did he say?

He said that he wasn’t gonna apologize because you guys are living

What?! You got us evicted!!
I told you not to go down there!
Well he made Rachel cry!
Rachel always cries!
That’s not true! (Starts to cry.)

Now Joey, you go down there and you suck up to him. I mean you suck like

All right! I’ll try! But if I can’t, you can stay with Chandler

Go!!

All right, all right, all right. (Starts to leave, stops, and turns

Whoa-whoa-whoa, hey! Now remember what we talked about, you gotta be

Yes. (In a stronger voice) Yes!

Good! That’s good!
Okay. (They go inside) (To the guy at the desk) I wanna quit the gym.

You do realize that you won’t have access to our new full

(He turns to Ross and Ross makes a ‘Be strong’ sound.) I

Okay, Dave in the membership office, handles quitters. (Both

Me? No.
Sorry, members only.

(horrified at the prospect of trying to quit alone and unsure about

It’s okay man, be strong. (Chandler goes into the office.)
(to Ross) So, are you a member of any gym.
No! And I’m not gonna be, so you can save you little speech.

Okay, no problem. (To someone out of the picture) Could you come

Hi, I’m Maria.
(looking at her feet) Wow, you have really pretty feet.
These old things.

Would you mind spending some time on my siadic area, it’s been

You mean the—Okay by siadic, you mean the towel covered portion.
Yeah.

Sure, yeah, no I can do that, yeah, because umm, y'know, the muscles in

tell me Rick, how umm, how did you injure the area.
Oh, a 16-hour sit-in for Greenpeace.
Oh. (She goes to work, and her head slowly drops out of view.)
Ow! Did you just bite me?
No!
: What?

Please don’t kick Monica and Rachel out, this wasn’t there

: You want me to kick you guys out instead?
No you can’t do that, where would the chick and the duck live?
: You have pets!

Noo-no-no, no, those are nicknames. I’m the chick and Chandler is the

: Huh, I would’ve thought it was the other way around.
Come on man, just-just let the girls stay, I’ll do whatever you want.
: Really? You’ll do anything?
Yeah-yeah, absolutely.
: Yeah, I’ve got something you can do.
What, what is it?
: Can you be my dancing partner?
That’s not, prison lingo, is it?
His dancing partner?!

Yeah, there’s this superintendent’s dance, the Super Ball. I

Well, why doesn’t he practice with a girl?

Well, he’s too shy, he doesn’t thing he’s good enough to
dance with girls yet.

Yeah, right, he almost danced me right down that…garbage chute.
(Starts to cry)
Oh, would you let it go already?! You’re fine!
Hey.
Hey! So, did you quit?
No, I almost did, couldn’t leave Ross there without a spotter!
Wait, now so you joined the gym?
And that’s funny, why?

Oh, umm, I was just y’know working out and umm… Oh,
that’s it.

We’re doomed. Okay, they’re gonna take 50 bucks out of our

Well, you could actually

Now, there’s two reasons.
(entering) Hey.
Hey!
Ohh, you guys, remember that cute client I told you about? I bit him.

On the touchy.
And

Well, next time your massaging him, you should try and distract

Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! Like-like when I’m doing something exciting and I

Thank you, Joey.
No-no, thank you.

: Ahhhh! I’m sorry!

No, it’s okay, but if I’m Marge, my breasts are coming out my

Come on Treeger, don’t say that. You just ahh, you just need more

Hey-hey, how goes the dancing? Gay yet?

Ah-ha-ha, you guys owe me big time. (He walks into the kitchen and does a

You just did a little dancy thing.

Yes you did! You did like a little hop.
You are soo enjoying this.

Ooh, this is soo sweet, Joey our little twinkle-toes.

All right.
I don’t know how to lead.
Hello.
Hi.

Close your accounts? Is there some kind of problem?
No-no.
No, we’d just like to close them.

Okay, Ms. Lambert handles all our closures. (to a beautiful woman)
Would you come over here please?
Hi, I’m Karen.

(thinking to herself) Okay, baseball. Rick, playing baseball. Okay,

(thinking to herself) Chandler’s knees. Chandler’s…

Oh wow! That was amazing, was that really just an hour?!
Yeah! In… really long hour world.

Suddenly, I very aware that I’m naked.

Oh yeah, oh and I know, but this isn’t what it looks like,
‘cause Rick is my ahh, husband.

Yes, I will tell her.

No! And somehow, we ended up with a joint checking account.

To pay for the gym.
Hey.

Hey! So I had a great day, Rick and I really hit it off, and we started

You got fired?!
Oh my Gosh!
It’s so weird, I have never been fired from anything before!
Sweety...

I just-I just started walking around not knowing what to do next,

Yeah… Bunny-rabbit.

Look, you wanna use our place?
: No, I ahh, had another idea.
We did it!!
: I know, we did it!! Hey, that was incredible, huh?!

Oh well, okay, good luck.

Unless you wanna practice the Foxtrot again? Or-or the Tango?

Okay.

Go get ‘em Treeger.

No, I’m good.

So it looks like you’ve got some great experience here.
Let’s see ahh, reason for leaving last job?
Yeah, they thought I was a whore.
Okay, we’ll give a call if anything comes up.
Great! Thank you very much.
